parameters.name: On
parameters.description: Turns the Light on, when set to 1. Turns it off, when set to 0.

parameters.name: Lock
parameters.description: Locks the Light when set to 1. Unlocks it, when set to 0. When locked, Light cannot be turned on\off by player.

parameters.name: Color
parameters.description: Sets the color of the LED Light. (See Data Network Colors)

outputs.name: On
outputs.description: Returns whether the Light is turned on. (0 for no, 1 for yes)

outputs.name: Lock
outputs.description: Returns whether the Light is locked. (0 for no, 1 for yes)

outputs.name: Color
outputs.description: Returns the color setting of the LED Light. (See Data Network Colors)

outputs.name: RequiredPower
outputs.description: Returns the current amount of power required by the Light, in watts.

outputs.name: Power
outputs.description: Returns whether the Light is turned on and receives power. (0 for no, 1 for yes)
